meanings.sent1: The hungry child consumes his meal quickly.
meanings.sent2: She consumes a glass of water after her workout.
meanings.sent3: The puppy consumes his food with such enthusiasm, it's adorable.
meanings.sent4: Time consumes memories like a hungry beast.
meanings.sent5: The fire consumes everything in its path, leaving only ashes behind.

meanings.definition: To use up or deplete a resource
meanings.sent1: The factory consumes a lot of energy to operate.
meanings.sent2: Driving long distances consumes a lot of fuel.
meanings.sent3: The marathon runner consumes all his energy before reaching the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The wildfire consumes acres of forest within hours.
meanings.sent5: The growing population consumes natural resources at an alarming rate.

meanings.definition: To be engrossed in an activity or thought
meanings.sent1: She consumes books like they are going out of style.
meanings.sent2: He consumes himself in solving complex puzzles.
meanings.sent3: The child consumes his time playing video games all day.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for music consumes her every waking moment.
meanings.sent5: The artist consumes himself in creating masterpieces, losing track of time.
